mapper.select:
select c.name as categoryName, a.id as id , a.title as title , a.content as content , a.status as status , a.praise_num as praiseNum , a.can_comment as canComment , a.is_public as isPublic , a.create_by as createBy , a.create_time as createTime , a.update_by as updateBy , a.update_time as updateTime
from bk_article a left join bk_category c on a.category_id = c.id and a.status != '2' where 1=1
AND a.title LIKE '%${bkArticle.title}%'
